title: World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher Workshops World War II Valor in the Pacific National Monument (VALR) hosts annual summer teacherâ€™s workshops.  With grants provided by the Grindstone Foundation, funding from Pacific Historic Parks and a partnership with the Hawaii Department of Education offering professional development credit for local teachers, VALR has been able to greatly impact the teaching of World War II locally. All Teacher Workshops
